00031 PointCloudAccumulator::PointCloudAccumulator(Node::NodePtr referenceNode) : INodeVisitor(downwards)  {
00032         accumulatedPointClouds = 0;
00033         this->referenceNode = referenceNode;
00034         reset();
00035 }
00036 
00037 PointCloudAccumulator::~PointCloudAccumulator() {
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 void PointCloudAccumulator::reset() {
00042         accumulatedPointClouds = new PointCloud3DIterator();
00043 }
00044 
00045 void PointCloudAccumulator::visit(Node* node){
00046         /* do nothing */
00047 }
00048 
00049 void PointCloudAccumulator::visit(Group* node){
00050         /* do nothing */
00051 }

00053 void PointCloudAccumulator::visit(Transform* node){
00054         /* do nothing */

00057 void PointCloudAccumulator::visit(GeometricNode* node){
00058         assert (node != 0);
00059         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transformFromReferenceToPointCloud = doGetTransformFromReferenceToPointCloud(node);
00060 
00061         /* check if geometry is a point cloud */
00062         Shape::ShapePtr resultShape;
00063         resultShape = node->getShape();
00064         rsg::PointCloud<brics_3d::PointCloud3D>::PointCloudPtr pcResultContainer(new rsg::PointCloud<brics_3d::PointCloud3D>());
00065         pcResultContainer = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<PointCloud<brics_3d::PointCloud3D> >(resultShape);
00066         if(pcResultContainer != 0) {
00067 //              LOG(DEBUG) << "Adding point cloud to iterator with:";
00068 //              LOG(DEBUG) << *pcResultContainer->data;
00069 //              LOG(DEBUG) << *transformFromReferenceToPointCloud;
00070                 accumulatedPointClouds->insert(pcResultContainer->data, transformFromReferenceToPointCloud);
00071         } else {
00072 //              LOG(DEBUG) << " Geometric node, but no PointCloud3D";
00073         }
00074 }
00075 
00076 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr PointCloudAccumulator::doGetTransformFromReferenceToPointCloud(GeometricNode* node) {
00077         assert (node != 0);
00078         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transformFromReferenceToPointCloud;
00079 
00080         /* we have to find the _shared_ pointer of the node - unless it is the root it will be one of the parents childs */
00081         if (node->getNumberOfParents() == 0) {
00082                 LOG(WARNING) << "PointCloudAccumulator: Are you sure your root node is a GeometricNode (which is a leaf)?";
00083 
00084                 /* so we take the identity */
00085                 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr identity(new HomogeneousMatrix44());
00086 
00087                 transformFromReferenceToPointCloud = identity;
00088 
00089         } else {
00090                 unsigned int childIndex = 0;
00091                 rsg::Node* parentNode;
00092                 parentNode = node->getParent(0); //all parents will have the _same_ shared pointer so we pick the first parent
00093                 Group* parentGroup =  dynamic_cast<Group*>(parentNode);
00094                 assert (parentGroup != 0); // otherwise st.h went really wrong.
00095                 childIndex = parentGroup->getChildIndex(node);
00096                 Node::NodePtr nodeAsSharedPtr = parentGroup->getChild(childIndex);
00097 
00098                 transformFromReferenceToPointCloud = getTransformBetweenNodes(nodeAsSharedPtr, referenceNode);
00099         }
00100 
00101         return transformFromReferenceToPointCloud;
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 }

00107 }
